data.text: @united I am upset. Several other passengers came up to me and said they would’ve reacted the same way. How you going to separate me from my minor child and think that’s okay?! I travel frequently enough to know better. I will be calling CS tomorrow!

data.text: Then the lady that works for @united said “you’re making me nervous.” The audacity! Y’all messed up and now that I’m reacting you want to act like I’m threatening you?! I never cussed or showed any aggression whatsoever

data.text: @united said because the flight got delayed and they were trying to get people on the flight. I said I don’t care about that. I purchased my seats over a month ago. Why am I inconvenienced?!

data.text: Second, @united tried to rectify the situation by sitting us by the toilet. I told them to sit the people they gave my seats to by the bathroom. I paid for the seats I wanted!

data.text:
My first time booking a flight with @united was a nightmare. First, Our flight got delayed three times.
We missed our connecting flight in Chicago. Then they separated my minor son’s and my seat. I purchased my seats over a month ago.
